mapper.select:
select b.BOM_CODE BOM_CODE ,b.REG_DATE REG_DATE ,b.DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION ,b.COMM COMM ,b.MANAGER MANAGER ,b.PRD_CODE PRD_CODE ,p.prd_name prd_name from BOM b left outer join prd p on b.prd_code = p.prd_code
AND UPPER(bom_code) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{bomCode} || '%')
ORDER BY BOM_CODE DESC

select b.B_DETAIL_CODE B_DETAIL_CODE ,b.QUANTITY_REQUIRED QUANTITY_REQUIRED ,b.COMM COMM ,b.BOM_CODE BOM_CODE ,b.MT_CODE MT_CODE ,b.NO NO ,m.MT_NAME MT_NAME ,m.MATERIAL_TYPE MATERIAL_TYPE ,m.SPECIFICATION SPECIFICATION ,m.UNIT UNIT ,m.UNIT_PRICE UNIT_PRICE from B_DETAIL b join mt m on b.mt_code = m.mt_code
AND UPPER(b.bom_code) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{bomCode} || '%')
ORDER BY b.B_DETAIL_CODE DESC, m.MT_CODE ASC
